Package es.ucm.fdi.lps.p3

Class Summary
Engine Represents the game engine that controls the execution of the game since the beginning to the end, dealing with the configuration, the input stream and the output stream.
Game Represents the state of all the elements of the game (locations, items, player inventory, etc.), and relevant constants for the game (the available movement directions, the keywords for a game textual definition, etc.).
Item Represents an item that can be placed in the player inventory or in the locations of the game.
ItemRepository Represents a repository of items, as the player inventory or the contents of a location.
Location Represents a location of the game, that may have items and connections to other locations.
Main The main entrance of the application that launches the game engine according to the command line options.
Parser Represents the parser of the game engine that analyzes the input stream and identifies valid commands.
 

Enum Summary
Game.Direction Represents all the possible directions for the connections between locations: NORTH, NORTHEAST, EAST, SOUTHEAST, SOUTH, SOUTHWEST, WEST, NORTHWEST, UP, DOWN, IN and OUT.
